adv.trappednewbie.requiem.tab.title: Stillborn
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.root.title: Meeting on the other side
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.root.descripti: Befriend the <icon:trapped_newbie:wandering_trader_head> <gold>Wandering Trader</gold> by using a Friendship Letter on them.
You can befriend other players too.
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.holder.title: <aqua>SoSeDiK's Universe
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.holder.descrip: Happy to see you with us!
<dark_gray>(note: this advancement always shows your current world)
Your entire existence depends on <owner>'s lucid dream
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.brave_new_worl: Fall into the void. Let's get into it!
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.first_possessi: Take control of some other mob
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.good_as_new.de: Cure your undead body into a human form
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.mere_mortal.de: Who needs immortality when the adventure awaits!
As a Panda, hit something with a Wooden Sword
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.first_drink.ti: Rivers of tears, puddles of dreams
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.first_drink.de: Drink some water (use <key:key.use> with a bare hand on a water source while sneaking)
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.get_a_sugar_ca: Harvest some Sugar Canes, typically located nearby rivers or an ocean
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.get_a_birch_ba: Remove the Bark from a Birch Log using an Axe (use <key:key.use> on Logs to strip them)
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.make_a_charcoa: Create a Charcoal Filter using Charcoal and two Papers
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.pick_up_some_w: Pick up some water into a container (Bowl, Bottle, or Canteen)
adv.trappednewbie.requiem.drink_pure_wat: Drink some purified water (a Charcoal Filter can be applied to the dirty water)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.tab.title: Back to the roots
adv.trappednewbie.basics.root.title: Back to the roots
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_branch.de: Get some Branches from the Leaves or a Deadbush
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_fiber.des: Get a Fiber from grass plants
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_twine.de: Create a Twine using three Fibers
adv.trappednewbie.basics.find_gravel.des:
Find some Gravel.

Note: you may break Grass Blocks/Dirt with a Rock until it turns into Gravel.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_flint.des: Get a Flint from a Gravel
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_flaked_fl: Create a Flaked Flint by tapping with a Flint on any kind of Stone
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_flint_shea: Make Flint Shears using a Twine and three Flaked Flints
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_rough_stic: Make Rough Sticks by cutting a Branch with Shears or a Knife
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_fire.des: Make a Fire by using Rough Sticks (alternately clicking <key:key.attack> - <key:key.use>) in both hands (can be used to lit a campfire)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_flint_ax: Make a Flint Axe using a Stick, a Twine and two Flaked Flints
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_log.title: A Tree Hater
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_log.descr: Attack a tree with an Axe until the Log pops out
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_chopping: Combine a Log with an Axe to make a Chopping Block
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_planks.des: Cut a Log on the Chopping Block to get some Planks
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_sticks.des: Make perfect Sticks by chopping Planks on the Chopping Block
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_grass_me: Make a Grass Mesh using two Sticks and Twines
adv.trappednewbie.basics.treasure_hunt.d: Get something special by sifting Gravel through the Mesh (click <key:key.use> on it with a Mesh)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_dead_bush: Get a Deadbush to become a happy noob
Burn a Log to get a Charcoal
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_firestri: Make a Firestriker using a Charcoal, a Flint and two Branches
adv.trappednewbie.basics.not_spawn_campi: Place a Campfire in The End at 1.894.255 14 -804.312 coordinates
Place a Campfire at a World-Border-Corner
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_flint_kn:
Make a Flint Knife using a Stick, a Twine and two Flaked Flints
(Knifes allow getting Branches and Fibers more easily)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_string.de: Obtain a String by killing Spiders
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_carpet.d:
Craft a Carpet
(once gained a human body, sitting on it will heal yourself)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_wool.desc: Obtain a Wool from a Sheep
adv.trappednewbie.basics.sleep_in_bed.de: Create a Bed and sleep in it in the Overworld
<red>The bed will act as an escape point from the lucid dreams
adv.trappednewbie.basics.eat_a_roasted_s: Cook a Spider Eye on a Campfire and eat it to obtain a Weakness effect
Sleep with a weakness effect to start lucid dreaming
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_work_sta:
Construct a Work Station.

This will discover all available recipes in the recipe book.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_flint_sh: Make a Flint Shovel using a Stick, a Flaked Flint and a Twine
adv.trappednewbie.basics.pathways.title: Pathways
adv.trappednewbie.basics.pathways.descri: Use a Shovel to create Dirt Paths <yellow>(they speed you up!)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.get_a_clay_ball: Get a Clay Ball with a Shovel
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_pot.desc:
Make a Flower Pot
(you can store items inside of it!)
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_clay_kil:
Create a Clay Kiln on a Work Station.

Note: you need to create a Fire under the Clay Kiln to burn items in it.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_stone.de: Burn a Cobblestone in the Clay Kiln to get a Stone
adv.trappednewbie.basics.moar_tools.desc: Craft a Stone Pickaxe, Axe, Shovel, Hoe, and a Sword
adv.trappednewbie.basics.body_helper.tit: Possessing someone else's body is hard…
adv.trappednewbie.basics.body_helper.des:
So why not take over it instead? Luckily, the human-like Zombies are perfect puppets.

Perform a «Soul Melancholy» ritual while possessing a suitable Zombie to link your souls and take complete control over its body.
adv.trappednewbie.basics.make_a_totem_ba: Use a Knife on a Log while sneaking to carve a Totem Base
adv.trappednewbie.basics.perform_a_ritua: Use a Totemic Staff on a Totem Base and successfully finish a ritual

adv.trappednewbie.adventure.root.title: Adventure
adv.trappednewbie.nature.tab.title: Nature's Paradise
adv.trappednewbie.nature.root.title: Nature's Paradise
adv.trappednewbie.nature.root.descriptio: The world is full of friends and food
adv.trappednewbie.building.tab.title: Building
adv.trappednewbie.building.root.title: Building
adv.trappednewbie.building.root.descript: Your only limit is your imagination… and resources
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.tab.title: Weaponry
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.root.title: Weaponry
Hit a mob with your Stick
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.slapfish.desc: Slap a mob across the face with a Fish
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.diemonds.desc: Hit a mob with a Diamond
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.inspector_gad: Kill a Zombie while holding a Spyglass
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.rock_paper_sh: Beat a Zombie at Rock, Paper, Shears
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.half_a_heart_: Be on half a heart of health for a minute
Stay on Half a Heart for 1 Real-Life Hour without any Armor
Stay on Half a Heart for 6 Real-Life Hours without any Armor nor Potion Effects
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.block_with_sh: Protect yourself from an enemy's attack with your Shield
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.get_a_banner_: Apply a banner to your Shield
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.master_shield: Deflect an attack from every hostile monster
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.deflect_40.de: Deflect a blow that does at least 40 damage with your Shield
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.attack_zombie: Catapult an Egg onto a Zombie's head
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.attack_squid_: Hit a Glow Squid while it's in the air with a Snowball
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.hook_pig.desc: Pull a Pig using a Fishing Rod
Pull a monster using a Fishing Rod
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.when_pigs_fin: Pull a Pig from 25 blocks below you and watch it go
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.attack_with_a: The spirit of Christmas… quickly drowned out by a battle
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_snow_gol: Kill a Snow Golem with a Snowball
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.get_killed_by: Get killed by a Snow Golem
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_a_braze_: Kill a Blaze using a Blaze Rod while both you and it are on fire
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_10_chick: Kill 10 Chickens while both you and the Chickens are in the air, without using Elytra, all in a single attempt, using a Bow
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.get_tnt.title: Bombs Away!
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.blow_up_a_cre: Blow up a Creeper with TNT
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.ignite_charge: Give a Charged Creeper the Levitation effect and set it on fire while it's airborne
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.blow_up_all_m: Blow up every hostile mob with TNT
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.hook_tnt.desc: Catch TNT on a Fishing Rod
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.hook_warden.d: Use a Fishing Rod to hook a Warden
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.hold_a_crowss: Use a Spyglass while holding a Crossbow
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_a_pillag: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.crossbows_hot: Have nine loaded Crossbows in your hotbar. All set!
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.pyrotechnic.d: Obtain a Firework of every shape and additional effect
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.crossbow_with: Load your Crossbow with a Firework
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_with_fir: Kill a mob using a Firework's explosion
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_ghast_wi: Kill a non-friendly Ghast using a Firework's explosion
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.attack_with_a: Attack a mob using an Axe
Attack a mob using all types of Axes
Hit a mob using all types of Shovels
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.spleaf.title: Spleaf
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.spleaf.descri: Kill a mob using a Shovel while both of you are standing on a Big Dripleaf
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.attack_with_a: Hit a mob with every type of weapon
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.shoot_a_mob_w: Shoot something with a Bow and Arrow
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.point_blank_s: Shoot a mob from point-blank range
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.die_from_skel: Die from a bow-wielding Skeleton not from an Arrow shot
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.sniper_duel.d: Kill a bow-wielding Skeleton with an Arrow from more than 50 meters away
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.bat_duel.desc: Kill a Bat from at least 100 blocks away
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.there_it_goes: Kill a mob at the bottom of the Overworld from the build limit using any kind of projectile
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.hunt_land_ani: Hunt all types of land animals with your Bow
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.you_monster.d: Kill every Type and Variant of Baby Animals
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.throw_trident: Throw a trident at something. Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_a_drowne: Kill a Drowned using a Trident from at least 30 metres
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_a_baby_t: Kill a baby Turtle that is below the sea level while you are at the height of more than 300 blocks by using a Trident
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_all_aqua: Hunt all types of aquatic creatures with your Trident
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_all_neth: Hunt all types of Nether creatures with your Trident
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.attack_with_a: Obtain a Mace and do a smash attack by hitting a mob after falling
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.mace_100_dama: Deal 50 hearts of damage in a single hit using a Mace
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.give_wind_mac: Give a «Wind Burst III» Mace to a Fox
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.mace_500_dama: Deal 250 hearts of damage in a single hit using a Mace… to one-shot a Warden
adv.trappednewbie.weaponry.kill_mobs_usi: Kill every mob by shoving items they spawn with or commonly interact with in their face, with <u>nothing</u> in your offhand

adv.trappednewbie.statistics.tab.title: Various statistics
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.root.title: Various statistics
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.root.descri: If your numbers go up, you're having more fun
I enjoy long walks & playing MC
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.walk_1000km: Walk 1000km. The statistics tab shall no longer be the grindy super challenges tab!
It can all fit in this bucket
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.wash_50.tit: Got me spinning like a Ballerina
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.wash_5k.tit: You know what makes no sense?
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.fish_5.desc: Catch 5 fish or items with a fishing rod
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.fish_25.des: Catch 25 fish or items with a fishing rod
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.fish_100.de: Catch 100 fish or items with a fishing rod
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.fish_250.de: Catch 250 fish or items with a fishing rod
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.fish_500.de: Catch 500 fish or items with a fishing rod
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.fish_1k.des: Catch 1000 fish or items with a fishing rod

adv.trappednewbie.statistics.fish_5k.des: Catch 5000 fish or items with a fishing rod

adv.trappednewbie.statistics.eat_5k.titl: Food is Love, Food is Life
Is it a Skeleton Horse yet?
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.pig_25km.ti: It'll die if you ride it too much
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.totem_100.t: Why are you so bad at this?
I hope you've built a raid farm
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.break_100_i: Break 100 blocks with an Iron Pickaxe
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.break_2500_: Break 2500 blocks with a Diamond Pickaxe
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.break_10k_n: Break 10.000 blocks with a Netherite Pickaxe
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.break_100k_: Break 100.000 blocks with a Netherite Pickaxe
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.deaths_1.de: Lived without fear and died without fear
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.deaths_50.d: You can't get to paradise behaving like that, ya know? Congrats in 50 deaths anyway!
You did it 250 times, unbelievable! Maybe consider stopping dying.
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.deaths_1000: Whatever, you're over the Death! One thousand tries!
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.play_1d.des: Survive the first night in your brand new world
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.play_365d.d: Play for a whole Minecraft year
adv.trappednewbie.statistics.horse_speed: Ride a tamed Horse that moves faster than 9 blocks per second
Ride a tamed Horse that moves faster than 11 blocks per second
Ride a tamed Horse that moves faster than 13 blocks per second
Ride a tamed Horse that moves faster than 14.1 blocks per second
